problem.p:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are true?
(i) A compilation error occurs if we type more than one character inside a pair of single quotes in a code statement, e.g., 'abc'
(ii) A compilation error occurs if we type nothing inside a pair of double quotes in a code statement, e.g., ""
(iii) A compilation error occurs if we type exactly one character inside a pair of double quotes in a code statement, e.g., "a"
